Author: IWillNeverLoveMyBody
Text: I think I'll go, if only because it'll be my last chance to see the people who are graduating. I've been avoiding opening texts for like three hours now from people asking if I'd be there. Ugh, just wish we could celebrate their graduation by treating them to dinner or something.

Author: red_ossifrage
Text: Oh god, bathing suits and pool parties. They're their own special brand of ED hell.   Personally, I would go even if you can't swim. Like, I spent high school pool parties lying on lounge chairs and reading (due to my "stomachache," "headache," etc). The part where everyone but me was in the pool definitely sucked, but soon enough someone else would get bored and join me.   Sorry you're dealing with this, man.
